title: Change in forces as angle decreases

content.prompt: At a later time, the angle θ is slowly decreased without changing the magnitude of the two forces. The angle θ continues to decrease until the force F→2 is horizontal, after which time the force F→2 remains horizontal. Which of the following best describes the changes in the normal force and the force of friction on the box while the angle is changing?

choices.label: The normal force increases and the force of friction increases.
The normal force increases and the force of friction decreases.
The normal force increases and the force of friction remains constant.
The normal force decreases and the force of friction remains constant.
The normal force decreases and the force of friction decreases.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
